participant_1.background:
I'd like to talk about my beard and how it has been a part of my life.
I played a concert last night and was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments!
my favorite drink is cuba libre.
I have two weaknesses: my eyes and my driving skills.
I'm trying to get into the gambling business, like my father.

participant_2.background:
I play soccer on the weekends to keep myself active and to have some fun.
i haven t had luck with finding a job.
i like gardening.
I treasure my collection of vintage horror movies, which I love to watch with my grandchildren.
i spend an hour getting ready in the morning.

content.text: Hey there. How are you doing?
I'm doing okay, how about you?
I'm doing pretty well, thanks. I just played a concert last night and it went really well!
That's awesome! What kind of music do you play?
I play a variety of instruments, but I mainly play the piano. I also sing and write songs.
That sounds really cool! I wish I could play an instrument.
It's not too late to learn! I started playing when I was 5 years old.
Maybe I'll give it a try sometime.
I definitely recommend it. It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to express yourself.
What's your favorite song to play?
That's a tough question. I have a lot of favorite songs, but I think one of my favorites is "Imagine" by John Lennon.
That's a great song! I love that one too.
Yeah, it's a really beautiful song.
What other hobbies do you have?
I like to garden, watch movies, and play video games.
Gardening sounds like a lot of fun. I've never really tried it before.
It is a lot of fun! It's a great way to get outside and get some exercise.
I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should! I'm sure you'd enjoy it.
Thanks for the suggestion.
